acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs annotated with @PodamConstructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosAnnotatedWithPodamConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableNoHierarchicalAnnotatedPojo
Then the Object <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableNoHierarchicalPojo [intField=-270939 should not be null
Then the int field should not be zero
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the Date object should not be null
Then the long[] array should not be null or empty
The long value cannot be zero
